title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.33 - Smoking or carrying lighted cigars, cigarettes, pipes, etc. in certain areas of terminal prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.33 - Smoking or carrying lighted cigars, cigarettes, pipes, etc. in certain areas of terminal prohibited

State Regulations

No person shall smoke or carry lighted cigars, cigarettes, pipes, matches or any naked flame in areas of the terminal where
smoking is prohibited by the Port Authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1220.33

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
